item.title: Pierwsze koty za p≈Çoty
item.description:
I don't speak London.

I created this page as a testing ground for my static site generator. If you like this template, it's included with it (template-simpleblog), but you'll have to do the details yourself.

If you want to know what Simpleblog is, see the descriptions of my old projects.

Here you will find news about my projects and my experiences with IT.

However, if you prefer to read in your news feed reader, grab the link: https://misskittin.github.io/news/feed.xml

Have fun!
